snippet.title: DYNASTY WARRIORS 5: EMPIRES OPENING INTRO
snippet.description:
Conquer the 25 areas of Ancient China and build an empire using cunning, diplomacy and uncompromising force. Before each battle meet with the war council to decide upon military and political policies for the kingdom; then it's time for war. The armies of the kingdom are at your command.

Official Site: http://www.koei.com/launch/dw5_empires/index.html
Platform(s): PlayStation 2, Xbox 360

Best Regards,
KOEI Ltd. - http://koei.co.uk
